New Records: Adolis Garcia set a record for RBIs in a postseason series with 15
Garcia's home run streak is tied for fourth-longest in postseason history
Key Match Events: Garcia homered twice and drove in five runs
Corey Seager got things started with a long home run in the first inning
Nathaniel Lowe also went deep to give Texas its first postseason win in 12 years
Jordan Montgomery pitched 2 1/3 scoreless innings out of the bullpen
Max Scherzer allowed four hits and two runs with two walks in 2 2/3 innings
Cristian Javier lost a playoff start for the first time, after entering the game 4-0 with a 0.82 ERA in four career postseason starts
Evan Carter hit a two-run double in the fourth inning
Garcia hit a solo shot in the eighth to give him seven homers and 20 RBIs this postseason
Pre-Game Insights: Adolis Garcia and the Rangers are tops in Texas and best in the American League
The Astros were finally dethroned by the Rangers
The Rangers have gone 8-0 away from home in these playoffs, joining the 1996 Yankees as the only teams to win their first eight road games in one postseason
Bruce Bochy became the first skipper to win a League Championship Series with three different teams
Post-Match Reflections: Adolis Garcia's performance was special and fun to watch
The Astros were down but not out
The Rangers have had their streaks, injuries, and kept getting up
The Astros' pitching staff got pounded for 20 runs in the final two games of the team's seventh consecutive ALCS
The Rangers and Astros had identical regular-season records (90-72), with the AL West title going to the Astros on a head-to-head tiebreaker
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at home for the Astros, where they went 40-47 this year and 0-4 in this series
The Astros won all three games at Texas and came home a win shy of their third straight pennant
The Rangers will face either Arizona or Philadelphia in the World Series, who play the decisive Game 7 of their NLCS on Tuesday night
The game was played on October 24, 2023
Others: The Rangers and Astros had a rivalry in the regular season
Jose Altuve hit his 27th career postseason homer in the ninth for Houston, two behind Manny Ramirez for most all-time
